actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to establish a temporary tariff rate quota for certain iron and steel articles in order to stimulate fair and free competition in the world steel trade.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to revise temporarily the customs duties on the importation of iron or steel products, and to impose a temporary import quota on such products. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to deposit revenues under this Act into the Adjustment Assistance Trust Fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to establish a temporary tariff rate quota for certain iron and steel articles in order to stimulate fair and free competition in the world steel trade.
